name: Falling Cats
description:
Falling Cats is a 2D platform game. The protagonist cat has to jump from board to board to get coins and use potions.

Commands: WASD or arrow keys (mobile touch enabled).

Potions functions:

The green potion increases the speed

The yellow potion is worth 10 game coins

The purple potion decreases gravity

In the ReadMe.txt file (included with the download) you will find all the legal information about the game. For any problems with the game's content, ask for it to be removed in the comments.
